config.name: session.maxConcurrent
config.description: Max number of sessions management server accepts. When this limit met, new session will be rejected

config.name: session.timeout
config.description: A timeout period assigned to a session. After timeout, the session will be cleaned out.

config.name: session.cleanup.interval
config.description: The interval management server checks expired sessions, in seconds

config.name: admin.showAllResource
config.description: A boolean value indicating whether admin account can see resources of user account
